name: image_to_text_ocr
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_lens_data.
Tool description: Cutting-edge visual image search and reverse image search, highly-detailed OCR, comprehensive text recognition, product information, QR Code reading, and rich knowledge graph insights, all in one API, powered by Google Lens.
API description: Extracts text from an image using the Google Lens OCR API and provides detailed detections at the paragraph, sentence, and word levels.

url.description: The URL of the image from which to extract text.

language.description:
Set the language of the results.

**Allowed values:** 2-letter language code, see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).
**Default:** en.
